Package com.flipkart.rest

Class CourseEnrollmentController

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.rest.CourseEnrollmentController
@Path("/enrollment")
public class CourseEnrollmentController
extends java.lang.Object
The type Course enrollment controller. All the operations related to enrollment of the Student and Professor in the Course Management System
